modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod makes cars (Sedans) in the color variants and 3 damage stages, bus variants and army trucks respawn randomly after disassembly.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod makes [cars](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-car-mods/) (Sedans) in the color variants and 3 damage stages, bus variants and army trucks [respawn](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-respawn/) randomly after disassembly (except by explosions).

The respawn block is an air block with no collision what avoids being accidentally broken.

**Default respawning:** 7 days.

In Readme has a tutorial to install the mod and to set a custom respawning days configuration.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1JhGTfYly-RTq6GldT4q-ePpnBBS09Qdl)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/16152-modlet-vehicles-respawning-a18/).

**Credits:** SAMUELPV
